import React from 'react' const Mechostory = () => { return ( <>

Mechodal Story

Welcome to the Story Page of Mechodal Group!

Mechodal Group has been on an inspiring journey of growth and transformation since its inception. Let's delve into our story and witness the milestones we have achieved along the way.

  • In 2021

    In 2021, Mechodal Technology was born with a powerful vision to revolutionize the mechanical industry. From the very beginning, we placed a strong emphasis on building meaningful connections with our clients and delivering top-notch services. Our primary focus was on mechanical design and architecture, providing reliable and efficient solutions that met the unique needs of our clients. During this time, we established our first office in Bhavnagar-Kalyabid, Gujarat, laying the foundation for our future endeavors.

  • As we entered 2022

    As we entered 2022, we continued to bolster our team of experts across different areas of our business. This expansion enabled us to broaden our IT services portfolio, offering our clients more comprehensive solutions. We took pride in building tailored platforms for our clients' businesses, providing them with custom solutions that helped them achieve their goals. In order to ensure seamless operations, we implemented significant changes to our management team, further enhancing the efficiency of our business.

    During this pivotal year, we experienced remarkable growth. We successfully raised funds for expansion and completed over 100 projects, solidifying our reputation as a trusted partner in the industry. To accommodate our growing team and clientele, we relocated to a larger office space, symbolizing our commitment to excellence and providing a comfortable environment for collaboration and innovation. Furthermore, we introduced innovative products to our clients, embracing new technologies and staying ahead of the curve. Our focus also shifted towards emerging fields such as Web3 Technology, machine learning, and NFTs, setting the stage for groundbreaking developments in the years to come.

  • In 2023

    In 2023, we proudly inaugurated our second branch in Ahmedabad, Gujarat, extending our services to a wider audience and establishing ourselves as a regional leader. We witnessed a significant increase in traffic to our website, with over 5,000 monthly visitors, a testament to our growing influence and reputation. Our commitment to exceptional service remained unwavering as we continued to prioritize client satisfaction and adapt to their evolving needs.

    Furthermore, we embarked on an exciting new venture with the launch of GraphiGlow Design, our sister firm specializing in animation and graphics. This expansion allowed us to offer a comprehensive range of services, from mechanical design to animation and graphic design, further solidifying our position as a versatile and innovative group.

    Our story is a testament to our unwavering dedication, relentless pursuit of excellence, and commitment to innovation. As we continue to evolve and expand, we remain focused on providing exceptional services to our clients while exploring new frontiers. Join us on this extraordinary journey as we shape the future of the Mechodal Group and the industries we serve.

) } export default Mechostory
